parse.title: List of largest lakes of Europe

text.*:
The regional division of Europe used in the table:
  Northern Europe
  Western Europe
  Eastern Europe
  Southern Europe

This is a list of lakes of Europe with an average area greater than 100 km². Some smaller lakes may be missing from the list.

Ranking:

  • [1]: Overall ranking
  • [2]: By sub-region

Reservoirs and smaller sub-basins that are already counted are not ranked.

List[edit]

[1] [2] Name Native names Country Average
area (km²) 		Average
area (mi²) 		Notes

Kuybyshev Kuybyshevskoye Reservoir, Ку́йбышевское водохрани́лище Russia 6,450 2,490 3rd largest reservoir in the world
3 N01 Vänern Sweden 5,655 2,183 Largest lake in Sweden and European Union
Rybinsk Rybinskoye Reservoir, Ры́бинское водохрани́лище Russia 4,580 1,770
